bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of yong 癰 , obstruction-illness, developing from the muscles of the abdominal wall. Prognosis of those festering to the outside is quite favorable; those festering towards the inside have a rather inauspicious prognosis. Xian chuan wai ke ji yan fang 仙傳外科集驗方 Fu tie ri yao 敷貼熱藥：肚癰一證，十有九死 , “Of persons with the condition of abdominal obstruction-illness , nine out of ten die”.
